code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import auth from'../firebase';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const userCredential=await auth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(email,password);console.log('User logged in successfully:',userCredential.user);}catch(error){setError(error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleLogin,children:"Log In"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Sign up"})]})]});};export default Login;
